scheme_name: Institutional Support for Development and Marketing of Tribal Products/Produce
description: This scheme provides institutional support for the development and marketing of tribal products, including agricultural and forest produce, to enhance tribal livelihoods.
key_features: Financial assistance for production and marketing
Support for branding and market linkages

criteria: NGOs and institutions working with tribals

steps: Apply through TRIFED or state tribal department

special_notes: Focus on minor forest produce and agricultural goods
